oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bushman terms for various degrees of relationship. Given by /han kass o (L VIII.
8847). Terms for various relationships by marriage. (L VIII.

12. 7067 rev. and 7068 rev., 32. 8794 rev.). Words and sentences concerning relationships and what people call their various relatives, as well as terms for plants and animals. (Some given by !nanni and Tamme.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Relationships and other words (words and sentences)
